function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using random sampling technique for data collection","Impact":"Possibility of missing out on segments of the population","Mitigation":"Use stratified sampling to ensure representation of all population segments","Technologies":"Stratified sampling tools and software","People":"Research participants and broader population","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Selection of sample size based on unlimited population","Impact":"Possibility of inaccurate representation of the population","Mitigation":"Use advanced statistical methods to estimate sample size for unlimited population","Technologies":"Statistical software for sample size determination","People":"Research team and statisticians","Owner":"Research team"}]}
